name: unicode-math-input
description: Easy way to insert unicode math symbols âˆ€ programming languages

commands.title: commit the string before the cursor to unicode

unicodeMath.TriggerStrings.title: Trigger Strings (deprecated)
unicodeMath.TriggerStrings.description: This is the strings that triggers the completion and commit, default is '\'
unicodeMath.TriggerStrings.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting will be deprecated at 1.0, please use `unicodeMathInput.TriggerStrings` instead

unicodeMathInput.TriggerStrings.title: Trigger Strings
unicodeMathInput.TriggerStrings.description: This is the strings that triggers the completion and commit, default is '\'

enumDescriptions: send a warning when some character cannot be converted to the font described by the prefix
do not send a warning when some character cannot be converted to the font described by the prefix
send a concise (modal) warning when some character cannot be converted to the font described by the prefix
unicodeMath.WarnPrefixFail.description: Send a warning when there is some character cannot be converted to unicode in the prefix conversion

enumDescriptions: send a warning when some LaTeX command cannot be converted  to unicode
do not send a warning when some LaTeX command cannot be converted to unicode
send a concise (modal) warning when some LaTeX command cannot be converted to unicode
unicodeMath.WarnSymbolFail.description: Send a warning when a symbol cannot be converted to unicode

unicodeMathInput.SubscriptPrefixes.title: Subscript Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.SubscriptPrefixes.description: The prefixes to trigger conversion to unicode subscripts, this string do not include the trigger string.

unicodeMathInput.SuperscriptPrefixes.title: Superscript Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.SuperscriptPrefixes.description: The prefixes to trigger conversion to unicode superscripts, this string do not include the trigger string.

unicodeMathInput.ItalicPrefixes.title: Italic font Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.ItalicPrefixes.description: The prefixes to trigger conversion to italic font unicode, this string do not include the trigger string.

unicodeMathInput.BoldPrefixes.title: Bold font Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.BoldPrefixes.description: The prefixes to trigger conversion to bold font unicode, this string do not include the trigger string.

unicodeMathInput.MathCalPrefixes.title: mathcal font Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.MathCalPrefixes.markdownDescription: The prefixes to trigger conversion to `\mathcal{}` font unicode, this string do not include the trigger string.

unicodeMathInput.MathFrakPrefixes.title: mathfrak font Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.MathFrakPrefixes.markdownDescription: The prefixes to trigger conversion to `\mathfrak{}` font unicode, this string do not include the trigger string.

unicodeMathInput.MathBBPrefixes.title: mathbb font Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.MathBBPrefixes.markdownDescription: The prefixes to trigger conversion to `\mathbb{}` font unicode, this string do not include the trigger string.

unicodeMathInput.mathsfPrefixes.title: mathsf font Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.mathsfPrefixes.markdownDescription: The prefixes to trigger conversion to `\mathsf{}` font unicode, this string do not include the trigger string.

unicodeMathInput.mathttPrefixes.title: mathtt font Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.mathttPrefixes.markdownDescription: The prefixes to trigger conversion to `\mathtt{}` font unicode, this string do not include the trigger string.

unicodeMathInput.mathscrPrefixes.title: mathscr font Prefixes
unicodeMathInput.mathscrPrefixes.markdownDescription: The prefixes to trigger conversion to `\mathscr{}` font unicode, this string do not include the trigger string.
